entry.title: Marked by a Bruise
entry.summary:
Author: HiSpooky

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,609Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 46

Summary: You can have the mark. You can also live a lifetime without a true soulmate bond ever showing itself. Whether it‚Äôs because you never truly loved, or because you gave up on the possibility, or perhaps, because the person you were meant for simply never crossed your path. The soulmate AU in this story is something I‚Äôve put my own twist on: in this world, everyone‚Äôs mark manifests during their childhood, only to vanish the moment they meet their soulmate. A new mark only resurfaces once the two truly fall in love.
